Summary: Small cylindrical, white object, Missile like, possibly a drone.
Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Cigar, Cylinder, Teardrop, Unknown
divs: Sighting Detailsstepped outside on back porch to smoke, was facing west towards mountain range, observed two airplanes, one flying west, the other flying northeast. Plane flying west was at a higher altitude than playing flying northeast( and was probably commercial aircraft flying towards D.I.A.) After planes had flow out of sight range, a small white cylindrical object at high speeds with, no noise flew in-between the apparent flightpath and altitudes of prior aircraft; at a westerly direction. Object at first appeared to have wing structure, but after observing for a minute or so; it was obvious it did not. Object either was at a very high altitude or indeed was very small in structure. Object appeared to be "meteoritic" at first but did not burn up, nor did it produce any short of tail , associated with a "shooting star."
